QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Tips for labor coaches
QAPair.Answer: You have a big job as the labor coach. You are the main person who will: Help the mother as labor begins at home., Stay and comfort her through labor and the birth., Whether you are helping the mother breathe or giving her a backrub, you will also be a familiar face on a hectic day. Just being there counts for a lot. Here are some tips for getting prepared.
